item.title: Welcome!
item.content:encoded:
Greetings!

This forum is intended to be utilized primarily by members of "Wiki Redux" in Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN. This will provide us with a place to discuss our own particular village strategy and goals as well as plan out future upgrades.

So please, come on in and join us in the hunt for more information!

Update: The Village has a good 40 or so people in it right now, but there's plenty of room for expansion, so don't be shy if you need a Village!
